channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloud Foundry -- CAPI-release
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloud Foundry -- CAPI-release

item.title: CVE-2019-3798|2024-09-17T04:09:11.026Z -- cloud%20foundry -- capi-release
item.description: Cloud Foundry Cloud Controller API Release, versions prior to 1.79.0, contains improper authentication when validating user permissions. A remote authenticated malicious user with the ability to create UAA clients and knowledge of the email of a victim in the foundation may escalate their privileges to that of the victim by creating a client with a name equal to the guid of their victim.
